duties_responsibilities.duty: Customer Interaction - Build and maintain strong relationships with existing customers and source new customers.
Work closely with Fleet Managers to balance workload within the assigned region.
Achieve key operational & financial metrics, maintain monthly KPI’s and report on variances.
Proactively anticipate, analyze, and troubleshoot problems with deliveries while maintaining cost-effectiveness and DOT compliance.
Review internal processes for compliance and controls.
Possess excellent communication, coaching, and leadership skills. Interact with all levels of the organization and with a variety of cultures.
Solve problems through creative, innovative solutions and challenge traditional methods of accomplishing tasks and removing obstacles.
